thread.title: TRYING TO FREAKIN SLEEP!!!
thread.title_full: TRYING TO FREAKIN SLEEP!!! - Review of Hilton Garden Inn Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Nathan P
title: TRYING TO FREAKIN SLEEP!!!
text:
When we checked in we made it clear that we needed to sleep a little while, as we had an overnight gig till 4:00am...we needed to wake up at 7:50pm to leave by 8:30pm for the venue ... after finally going to sleep around 6:00pm they started doing unbelievable SCHEDULED construction in the room above us...The Mgr finally called us back and said they had ANOTHER room for us!! After we had been calling down for the last 1/2 hour!!! It was too late!!
HATE THIS INCONVENIENCE!!! Especially after we told them that we needed to SLEEP!!!
This is not a rant ... but simply the facts!!!
I am a HILTON member!!! Do not stay here!!! Go somewhere else!!!
